SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ecs_deposit (id, deposit_money, real_name, account_name, bank_account, phone, remark, add_time, user_id, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{depositMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ecs_deposit set deposit_money = #{depositMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_account = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, deposit_money, real_name, account_name, bank_account, phone, remark, add_time, user_id, status from ecs_deposit where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, deposit_money, real_name, account_name, bank_account, phone, remark, add_time, user_id, status from ecs_deposit
